LanguageData.PsychicDroneCultist.stages.0.label: psychic soothe (medium)
LanguageData.PsychicDroneCultist.stages.0.description: It's like a calming voice at the back of my mind, soothing me, settling my nerves.
LanguageData.PsychicDroneCultist.stages.1.label: psychic drone (low)
LanguageData.PsychicDroneCultist.stages.1.description: It's like a scratching at the back of my mind. A voice, whispering. I can only make out a few words, and I recognize the song calling to me.
LanguageData.PsychicDroneCultist.stages.2.label: psychic drone (medium)
LanguageData.PsychicDroneCultist.stages.2.description: I feel like the voice could be coming from just around the corner.
LanguageData.PsychicDroneCultist.stages.3.label: psychic drone (high)
LanguageData.PsychicDroneCultist.stages.3.description: The voice is serene and comforting
LanguageData.PsychicDroneCultist.stages.4.label: psychic drone (extreme)
LanguageData.PsychicDroneCultist.stages.4.description: My heart pounds and I'm sweating. The call has found me.
